Trial runner helper function

run_trial.Rd

Trial runner helper function

Usage

run_trial(
  model,
  stop = socmod::fixated,
  legacy_behavior = "Legacy",
  adaptive_behavior = "Adaptive",
  metadata = list()
)

Arguments

model

An AgentBasedModel

stop

Stopping condition: max steps (int) or predicate function

adaptive_behavior

The behavior treated as "adaptation success". Default is "Adaptive".

Value

A Trial object

Examples

agents <- c(
  Agent$new(id = 1, name = "1", behavior = "Legacy", fitness = 1),
  Agent$new(id = 2, name = "2", behavior = "Adaptive", fitness = 4)
)
net <- igraph::make_graph(~ 1-2)
model <- make_abm(agents = agents, graph = net)
trial <- run_trial(model, stop = 10)
